ComicInfo.Title: Sins of the Salton Sea #5
ComicInfo.Summary:
From Beneath the Salton Sea, the Creature Emerges! In this climactic issue, the Sons of the Salton Sea capture Silver and prepare to sacrifice him to the tentacled creature lurking in the Salton Sea. Wyatt, fresh off the death of his brother, rushes to the scene to stop them. When he is confronted with the truth behind the cult, will the ex-con maintain his conviction that Silver must be saved â€” or let him meet his final fate?
